00052 #define drand48() (((float) rand())/((float) RAND_MAX))
00053 #define srand48(x) (srand((x)))
00054 #else
00055 extern double drand48(void);
00056 extern void srand48(long seedval);

00064 #define BLACKRING 1

00066 #define YELLOWRING 3
00067 #define GREENRING 4

00086 unsigned char rgb_colors[RINGS][3];
00087 int mapped_colors[RINGS];
00088 float dests[RINGS][3];

00095 void
00096 FillTorus(float rc, int numc, float rt, int numt)
00097 {
00098     int i, j, k;
00099     double s, t;
00100     double x, y, z;
00101     double pi, twopi;
00102 
00103     pi = M_PI;
00104     twopi = 2 * pi;
00105 
00106     for (i = 0; i < numc; i++) {
00107         glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
00108         for (j = 0; j <= numt; j++) {
00109             for (k = 1; k >= 0; k--) {
00110                 s = (i + k) % numc + 0.5;
00111                 t = j % numt;
00112 
00113                 x = cos(t * twopi / numt) * cos(s * twopi / numc);
00114                 y = sin(t * twopi / numt) * cos(s * twopi / numc);
00115                 z = sin(s * twopi / numc);
00116                 glNormal3f(x, y, z);
00117 
00118                 x = (rt + rc * cos(s * twopi / numc)) * cos(t * twopi / numt);
00119                 y = (rt + rc * cos(s * twopi / numc)) * sin(t * twopi / numt);
00120                 z = rc * sin(s * twopi / numc);
00121                 glVertex3f(x, y, z);
00122             }
00123         }
00124         glEnd();
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 float
00129 Clamp(int iters_left, float t)
00130 {
00131 
00132     if (iters_left < 3) {
00133         return 0.0;
00134     }
00135     return (iters_left - 2) * t / iters_left;
00136 }
00137 
00138 void
00139 Idle(void)
00140 {
00141     int i, j;
00142     int more = GL_FALSE;
00143 
00144     for (i = 0; i < RINGS; i++) {
00145         if (iters[i]) {
00146             for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
00147                 offsets[i][j] = Clamp(iters[i], offsets[i][j]);
00148             }
00149             angs[i] = Clamp(iters[i], angs[i]);
00150             iters[i]--;
00151             more = GL_TRUE;
00152         }
00153     }
00154     if (more) {
00155         glutPostRedisplay();
00156     } else {
00157         glutIdleFunc(NULL);
00158     }
00159 }
00160 
00161 void
00162 DrawScene(void)
00163 {
00164     int i;
00165 
00166     glPushMatrix();
00167 
00168     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00169     gluLookAt(0, 0, 10, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0);
00170 
00171     for (i = 0; i < RINGS; i++) {
00172         if (rgb) {
00173             glColor3ubv(rgb_colors[i]);
00174         } else {
00175             glIndexi(mapped_colors[i]);
00176         }
00177         glPushMatrix();
00178         glTranslatef(dests[i][0] + offsets[i][0], dests[i][1] + offsets[i][1],
00179             dests[i][2] + offsets[i][2]);
00180         glRotatef(angs[i], rotAxis[i][0], rotAxis[i][1], rotAxis[i][2]);
00181         glCallList(theTorus);
00182         glPopMatrix();
00183     }
00184 
00185     glPopMatrix();
00186     if (doubleBuffer) {
00187         glutSwapBuffers();
00188     } else {
00189         glFlush();
00190     }
00191 }
00192 
00193 float
00194 MyRand(void)
00195 {
00196     return 10.0 * (drand48() - 0.5);
00197 }
00198 
00199 void
00200 ReInit(void)
00201 {
00202     int i;
00203     float deviation;
00204 
00205     deviation = MyRand() / 2;
00206     deviation = deviation * deviation;
00207     for (i = 0; i < RINGS; i++) {
00208         offsets[i][0] = MyRand();
00209         offsets[i][1] = MyRand();
00210         offsets[i][2] = MyRand();
00211         angs[i] = 260.0 * MyRand();
00212         rotAxis[i][0] = MyRand();
00213         rotAxis[i][1] = MyRand();
00214         rotAxis[i][2] = MyRand();
00215         iters[i] = (deviation * MyRand() + 60.0);
00216     }
00217 }
00218 
00219 void
00220 Init(void)
00221 {
00222     int i;
00223     float top_y = 1.0;
00224     float bottom_y = 0.0;
00225     float top_z = 0.15;
00226     float bottom_z = 0.69;
00227     float spacing = 2.5;
00228     static float lmodel_ambient[] =
00229     {0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00230     static float lmodel_twoside[] =
00231     {GL_FALSE};
00232     static float lmodel_local[] =
00233     {GL_FALSE};
00234     static float light0_ambient[] =
00235     {0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 1.0};
00236     static float light0_diffuse[] =
00237     {1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.0};
00238     static float light0_position[] =
00239     {0.8660254, 0.5, 1, 0};
00240     static float light0_specular[] =
00241     {1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.0};
00242     static float bevel_mat_ambient[] =
00243     {0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0};
00244     static float bevel_mat_shininess[] =
00245     {40.0};
00246     static float bevel_mat_specular[] =
00247     {1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.0};
00248     static float bevel_mat_diffuse[] =
00249     {1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00250 
00251     srand48(0x102342);
00252     ReInit();
00253     for (i = 0; i < RINGS; i++) {
00254         rgb_colors[i][0] = rgb_colors[i][1] = rgb_colors[i][2] = 0;
00255     }
00256     rgb_colors[BLUERING][2] = 255;
00257     rgb_colors[REDRING][0] = 255;
00258     rgb_colors[GREENRING][1] = 255;
00259     rgb_colors[YELLOWRING][0] = 255;
00260     rgb_colors[YELLOWRING][1] = 255;
00261     mapped_colors[BLUERING] = BLUE;
00262     mapped_colors[REDRING] = RED;
00263     mapped_colors[GREENRING] = GREEN;
00264     mapped_colors[YELLOWRING] = YELLOW;
00265     mapped_colors[BLACKRING] = BLACK;
00266 
00267     dests[BLUERING][0] = -spacing;
00268     dests[BLUERING][1] = top_y;
00269     dests[BLUERING][2] = top_z;
00270 
00271     dests[BLACKRING][0] = 0.0;
00272     dests[BLACKRING][1] = top_y;
00273     dests[BLACKRING][2] = top_z;
00274 
00275     dests[REDRING][0] = spacing;
00276     dests[REDRING][1] = top_y;
00277     dests[REDRING][2] = top_z;
00278 
00279     dests[YELLOWRING][0] = -spacing / 2.0;
00280     dests[YELLOWRING][1] = bottom_y;
00281     dests[YELLOWRING][2] = bottom_z;
00282 
00283     dests[GREENRING][0] = spacing / 2.0;
00284     dests[GREENRING][1] = bottom_y;
00285     dests[GREENRING][2] = bottom_z;
00286 
00287     theTorus = glGenLists(1);
00288     glNewList(theTorus, GL_COMPILE);
00289     FillTorus(0.1, 8, 1.0, 25);
00290     glEndList();
00291 
00292     glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00293     glCullFace(GL_BACK);
00294     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00295     glClearDepth(1.0);
00296 
00297     if (rgb) {
00298         glClearColor(0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.0);
00299         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_AMBIENT, light0_ambient);
00300         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, light0_diffuse);
00301         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_SPECULAR, light0_specular);
00302         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, light0_position);
00303         glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00304 
00305         glLightModelfv(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_LOCAL_VIEWER, lmodel_local);
00306         glLightModelfv(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_TWO_SIDE, lmodel_twoside);
00307         glLightModelfv(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_AMBIENT, lmodel_ambient);
00308         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00309 
00310         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_AMBIENT, bevel_mat_ambient);
00311         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_SHININESS, bevel_mat_shininess);
00312         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_SPECULAR, bevel_mat_specular);
00313         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_DIFFUSE, bevel_mat_diffuse);
00314 
00315         glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_DIFFUSE);
00316         glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00317         glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00318     } else {
00319         glClearIndex(BACKGROUND);
00320         glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00321     }
00322 
00323     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00324     gluPerspective(45, 1.33, 0.1, 100.0);
00325     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00326 }

00328 void
00329 Reshape(int width, int height)
00330 {
00331     glViewport(0, 0, width, height);
00332 }

00334 /* ARGSUSED1 */
00335 void
00336 Key(unsigned char key, int x, int y)
00337 {
00338 
00339     switch (key) {
00340   case 27:
00341       exit(0);
00342       break;
00343   case ' ':
00344       ReInit();
00345       glutIdleFunc(Idle);
00346       break;
00347     }
00348 }
00349 
00350 GLenum
00351 Args(int argc, char **argv)
00352 {
00353     GLint i;
00354 
00355     rgb = GL_TRUE;
00356     doubleBuffer = GL_TRUE;
00357 
00358     for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00359         if (strcmp(argv[i], "-ci") == 0) {
00360             rgb = GL_FALSE;
00361         } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-rgb") == 0) {
00362             rgb = GL_TRUE;
00363         } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-sb") == 0) {
00364             doubleBuffer = GL_FALSE;
00365         } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-db") == 0) {
00366             doubleBuffer = GL_TRUE;
00367         } else {
00368             printf("%s (Bad option).\n", argv[i]);
00369             return GL_FALSE;
00370         }
00371     }
00372     return GL_TRUE;
00373 }

00375 void
00376 visible(int vis)
00377 {
00378     if (vis == GLUT_VISIBLE) {
00379         glutIdleFunc(Idle);
00380     } else {
00381         glutIdleFunc(NULL);
00382     }
00383 }

00385 int
00386 main(int argc, char **argv)
00387 {
00388     GLenum type;
00389 
00390     glutInitWindowSize(400, 300);
00391     glutInit(&argc, argv);
00392     if (Args(argc, argv) == GL_FALSE) {
00393         exit(1);
00394     }
00395     type = (rgb) ? GLUT_RGB : GLUT_INDEX;
00396     type |= (doubleBuffer) ? GLUT_DOUBLE : GLUT_SINGLE;
00397     glutInitDisplayMode(type);
00398 
00399     glutCreateWindow("Olympic");
00400 
00401     Init();
00402 
00403     glutReshapeFunc(Reshape);
00404     glutKeyboardFunc(Key);
00405     glutDisplayFunc(DrawScene);
00406 
00407     glutVisibilityFunc(visible);
00408 
00409     glutMainLoop();
00410     return 0;             /* ANSI C requires main to return int. */
00411 }
